note: •• Everyone just calls me Turley •• • Huge Linux, FOSS, and tech/people equality advocate dedicated to lowering the barrier for entry for those who want to enter the tech world and am hell-bent on destroying toxic gate-keeping that prevents anyone from believing they can thrive in the tech/STEAM space…or really anywhere at all • • Professionally, I have a fun job title that doesn’t always effectively describe what I really do…so I’m gravitating towards the “Tech Duder” title •
